issue.title: [Doc] Add guidance on partitioning datasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15150](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15150). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We get a fair number of questions that stem from people unknowingly creating too many files or too many row groups.  We should add some basic advice to help users understand the consequences of over-partitioning.
